## contains variable

Returns `true` if a given node contains nodes of a given `nodeType`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
contains: ({ node, type }: ContainsParams) => boolean
```

## Remarks


```ts
if (contains(panel, schema.nodes.listItem)) {

}

```
